titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Gilbert Pattisson, [14. 9. 1931]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: This is how the total eclipse looked in Mariazell. You see me soaring in the air. I shall come through London between the 5th & the 9th. I'll let you know the exact date later.
